subject: Entrepreneurship
title: The OODA Loop: Decide Faster Than Your Rivals
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The OODA Loop: Decide Faster Than Your Rivals.

buildup.text: The OODA Loop: Observe, Orient, Decide, Act. Cycle through it faster than your opponent and you win.

discovery.text: Boyd proved that the side completing its decision cycle fastest gains a decisive advantage.

twist.text: Startups naturally OODA faster than corporations. Big companies observe and orientâ€”but decide too slowly.

climax.text: Instagram's pivot from Burbn to photo-sharing took 8 weeks. A corporation would have taken 8 months.

punchline.text: The fastest learner wins, not the biggest spender.
